{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Prince Aruihi |image = Portrait Prince Aruihi Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Prince Aruihi.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Male |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = [Huana](/huana/) |deity = |personality = |class = Brute |level = 15 |MIG = 17 |CON = 18 |DEX = 13 |PER = 14 |INT = 11 |RES = 11 |health = 361 |damage = 20-29 {{slash}} |accuracy = 86 |penetration = 9 |deflection = 63 |fortitude = 97 |reflex = 76 |will = 61 |dr = 4 |dr slash = 5 |dr crush = 5 |dr pierce = 5 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/), [Arms Bearer](/armsBearerDeadfire/), [Fast Runner](/fastRunnerDeadfire/), [Carnage](/carnageDeadfire/), [Blooded](/bloodedDeadfire/), [Frenzy](/frenzyDeadfire/), [Barbaric Blow](/barbaricBlowDeadfire/), [Thick Skinned](/thickSkinned/), [Bloody Slaughter](/bloodySlaughterDeadfire/), [One Stands Alone](/oneHandedStyleDeadfire/), [Constant Recovery](/constantRecoveryDeadfire/), [Knock Down](/knockDownDeadfire/), [Cleaving Stance](/cleavingStance/), [Defender Stance](/defenderStance/), [Determination](/determination/), [Warrior Stance](/warriorStance/), [Hold the Line](/holdTheLineDeadfire/), [Tactical Barrage](/tacticalBarrage/), [Body Control](/bodyControlDeadfire/), [Vigorous Defense](/vigorousDefenseDeadfire/) |location = [Kahanga Palace](/kahangaPalace/) |quests = [Delver's Row (quest)](/delversRowQuest/)
[Trade Secrets](/tradeSecrets/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = Equipped gear, [Folded Note](/foldedNoteQueenOnekazaIi/) |head = Serpent Crown |neck = Amulet of Greater Health |body = Royal Huana Clothing |hands = Onepahua's Strength |waist = Girdle of Mortal Protection |weapon1 = Exceptional Battle Axe (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Battle Axe |internalname = NPC_PD_Prince_Aruihi |guid = cd5af313-7ef6-47db-be30-d6ce50505f92 }} '''Prince Aruihi''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|A sizable aumaua standing by the throne takes a bold step forward and flares his nostrils at the assembled dignitaries. A hush falls over the room.}} Prince Aruihi is the brother of [Queen Onekaza II](/queenOnekazaIi/) who thrives in the cutthroat political environment of the palace. While his sister focuses on maneuvering between Rauatai and the Republics, he focuses on domestic security and stamping out the threats to stability among the Huana and Neketaka. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Delver's Row (quest)](/delversRowQuest/)
[Trade Secrets](/tradeSecrets/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Delver's Row (quest)](/delversRowQuest/) and [Trade Secrets](/tradeSecrets/): The Prince wants to locate the black market in order to figure out whether it poses a danger to his sister's rule. [Category:Serpent's Crown characters](/categorySerpentsCrownCharacters/) [Category:Kahanga Palace characters](/categoryKahangaPalaceCharacters/)

While his sister focuses on maneuvering between Rauatai and the Republics, he focuses on domestic security and stamping out the threats to stability among the Huana and Neketaka. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Delver's Row (quest)]]
